topics.career: Talk about work, careers, and professional growth!

queue.findingPartner: We're finding the perfect conversation partner for you!

whileWaiting.title: While you wait...
whileWaiting.tip1: Make sure your camera and microphone are working
whileWaiting.tip2: Think about what you'd like to talk about
whileWaiting.tip3: Relax and get ready for a great conversation!
whileWaiting.tip4: Remember: it's okay to make mistakes when learning

queue.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the queue?

waiting.pairedSameLevel: You'll be paired with someone at the same level

matching.title: Video Call Practice
matching.subtitle: Practice English with native speakers and learners worldwide

randomQuestions.q2: If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?
randomQuestions.q3: What's the best book you've read recently?
randomQuestions.q6: If you could have dinner with anyone, who would it be?
randomQuestions.q7: What's the most interesting place you've visited?
randomQuestions.q8: What's a skill you'd like to learn?
randomQuestions.q10: What's your favorite way to relax?
randomQuestions.q11: If you could live in any time period, when would it be?
randomQuestions.q12: What's the best advice you've ever received?
randomQuestions.q13: What's something that always makes you smile?
randomQuestions.q14: If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
randomQuestions.q15: What's your favorite type of music?
randomQuestions.q18: If you could learn any language, which would it be?
randomQuestions.q19: What's your favorite season and why?
randomQuestions.q20: What's a goal you're working towards?

matching.lookingForSomeone: We're looking for someone who wants to practice {{topic}}
matching.tip1: Be respectful and patient with your partner
matching.tip2: Don't worry about making mistakes - practice makes perfect!
matching.tip3: Ask questions to keep the conversation flowing
matching.tip4: Share your experiences and listen to theirs
matching.tip5: Have fun and enjoy the cultural exchange!

howItWorks.title: How the Video Call System Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Connect with other users to practice English in live conversations

realTime.title: Real-Time Conversations
realTime.description: Connect instantly with other users to practice English through real-time video calls.

matching.title: Intelligent Matching System
matching.description: Our algorithm connects users with similar English levels for a balanced learning experience.

step1.title: Check Available Periods
step1.description: On the dashboard, check the system status and session times. Make sure there's an active session or wait for the next one.

step2.title: Choose an Option
step2.description: You can choose between finding a partner automatically, creating a private room, or joining an existing room with an ID.

step3.title: Wait in Queue (if needed)
step3.description: If you chose "Find a Partner", you'll enter the waiting queue. The system will show a countdown and try to find a compatible partner.

step4.title: Connect and Practice
step4.description: When a partner is found or you enter a room, you'll be redirected to the video call to start conversing in English.

video.title: High Quality Video
video.description: HD video streaming for a clear and crisp experience

audio.title: Crystal Clear Audio
audio.description: Optimized audio quality for clear conversations

controls.title: Media Controls
controls.description: Mute/unmute audio and video as needed

timer.title: Session Timer
timer.description: Time control for structured practice sessions

howItWorks.title: How Matching Works
howItWorks.description: Our matching system considers several factors to connect compatible users:

queue.title: Waiting Queue
queue.description: When you click "Find a Partner", you enter an intelligent waiting queue:

countdown.title: Countdown Timer
countdown.description: A real-time timer shows how long you've been waiting in the queue. The system continues searching for a partner during this time.

realtime.title: Real-Time Updates
realtime.description: The queue page automatically updates when a partner is found, instantly redirecting you to the video call room.

cancel.title: Cancel Anytime
cancel.description: You can leave the queue at any time by clicking the "Cancel" button and returning to the dashboard.

waiting.title: Waiting Time
waiting.factor1: Number of users online at the moment
waiting.factor2: Time of day (peak periods have more users)
waiting.tip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Evening periods generally have more users available.

limits.title: Usage Limits
limits.description: To ensure fair availability for all users, the system may have usage limits:

usage.title: Usage Limit Reached
usage.description: If you reach the usage limit, the "Find a Partner" button will be temporarily disabled. An explanatory message will be displayed on the dashboard.
usage.note: Note: Private rooms (Create Room and Join Room) are not affected by usage limits.

prepare.title: Prepare Beforehand
prepare.description: Have conversation topics in mind and make sure your environment is suitable

audio.title: Test Your Audio
audio.description: Check if your microphone and headphones are working before starting

polite.title: Be Respectful
polite.description: Maintain a friendly and respectful tone throughout the conversation

time.title: Respect Time
time.description: Be punctual and respect the agreed time for the session

noVideo.title: Video Issues
noVideo.description: Check if your camera is connected and permissions are enabled in the browser

noAudio.title: Audio Issues
noAudio.description: Test your microphone in browser settings and check if it's not muted

connection.title: Connection Issues
connection.description: Check your internet connection and try refreshing the page

periods.title: Period System
periods.description: The video call system operates during specific periods throughout the day. Each period has a defined start and end time:

status.title: System Status
status.description: The dashboard shows the current system status with an informative banner at the top:
status.activeDesc: When there's a session in progress, you can start a conversation immediately.
status.waitingDesc: Between sessions, a countdown shows the time remaining until the next available session.

viewing.title: Viewing Periods
viewing.description: On the dashboard, you will see:
viewing.current: The current session highlighted (if there is one active)
viewing.next: The next available session (if there's no active session)
viewing.expandButton: "View all" button to expand and see all periods of the day

startNewCall.title: Start New Call
startNewCall.description: Initiates the automatic matching process to find a conversation partner.

createRoom.title: Create Room
createRoom.description: Creates a private room with a unique ID that you can share with friends.
createRoom.step3: Share the ID with your friends
createRoom.step4: Wait for them to join the room

joinRoom.title: Join with Room ID
joinRoom.description: Join an existing room using the ID provided by a friend.
joinRoom.step1: Paste the room ID in the field
joinRoom.step3: System connects you to the room

privateRooms.title: Private Rooms:
privateRooms.tip3: Room ID is unique and secure
